name: Pixelate Texture - February 2021 (2/12)
description:
Controls:

Movement - W/A/S/D

Interact/draw - Left mouse button

Brush parameters - Tab

The second mini project this year was to try and work with shaders a bit. I have only barely scratched the surface, but it was fun to try out and I am looking forward to doing some proper work with shaders.

The shader that I tried to create was a pixelation shader, that takes a texture and pixelates it. The main purpose of it is to make quick and cheat fake pixel art texture that can be used when prototyping games or for game jams.

Shader can be downloaded from this page.
